an10.194:1.1: “I will teach you the principle to cultivate and the principle not to cultivate. …
an10.194:1.3: And what is the principle not to cultivate?
an10.194:1.6: This is called the principle not to cultivate.
an10.194:2.1: And what is the principle to cultivate?
an10.194:2.4: This is called the principle to cultivate.”
